reviewText: Love the product and enjoyed it.  It was very secure with no scratches or anything.  I would recommend this for any woman who will be attacked on the street.

this is very informative, and I'm glad they're teaching you things that are simple, but effective.  I'm not in the best of shape, I'm no martial arts expert, but I can follow the techniques in this video.

Bought this for daughter and was impressed with it.  Had wife watch it as well.  This is an extremely valuable video for women of all ages to give them the ability to handle situations they hopefully never have to deal with in the first place.

This is the best DVD for women covering street self-defense I have used.  The situations are real world and the victims' responses are both devastating and effective.  Every women, martial artist or not, needs to view and study the contents of this DVD.  Excellent product!
After seeing this video, I was very impressed. It is very easy to understand and is great for the person without any experience. A must for all women.
Wife loves this video, really gave her the confidence to travel home on train each night.  Really relevant and practical instruction for real world scenarios
